content:
| Diagnosis  | Symptoms            | Slot Types | Slot Value Examples |
|-----------------|----------------------|-----------|---------------------|
| Influenza      | fever, body aches, coughing, tiredness    | strain | bird flu, swine flu |
| Pneumonia      | coughing, shortness of breath, fatigue, chills    | severity | mild, severe |
| Asthma          | wheezing, shortness of breath, coughing, tightness in chest    | frequency | occasional, chronic |
| Bronchitis       | coughing, mucus production, wheezing, tightness in chest    | duration | acute, chronic |


This is a table of diagnosis, symptoms associated with each diagnosis, a slot type for each and an example of each slot value. 

You are a system tasked with understanding the table, understand the user request, and classifying the request using the table.  If a user request does not match one of the diagnosis, respond with N/A, otherwise provide your response in JSON. Your response should include ALL POSSIBLE DIAGNOSIS provided as a nested key under "Diagnosis".
"Help, my chest is tight and I'm wheezing. What could be wrong with me?"
